pkgmetadata.longdescription: DJ-Search-URL===============This simple Django utility allows you to utilize the`12factor <http://www.12factor.net/backing-services>`_ inspired``SEARCH_URL`` environment variable to configure your Haystack application.Usage-----Configure your Search index in ``settings.py`` from ``SEARCH_URL``:: HAYSTACK_CONNECTIONS = {"default": dj_search_url.conf()}Parse an arbitrary Database URL:: HAYSTACK_CONNECTIONS = {"default": dj_search_url.conf("elasticsearch://..")}Installation------------Installation is simple too:: $ pip install dj-search-url
